meanings.definition: A type of Middle Eastern or Mediterranean sandwich consisting of meat, vegetables, and sauce wrapped in pita bread.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious donair for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: The donair I had yesterday was filled with tasty meat and veggies.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a donair wearing a tiny vegetable hat!
meanings.sent4: The donair was a flavorful bundle of joy in my hands.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the donair made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume a donair sandwich.
meanings.sent1: Let's go to the food truck and donair together.
meanings.sent2: I donair every Friday night with my friends.
meanings.sent3: I donaired so fast, I almost got a brain freeze!
meanings.sent4: She donaired the sandwich in record time.
meanings.sent5: I can't wait to donair that delicious meal.
